mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.qingjia_uuid_number as qingjiaUuidNumber ,a.qingjia_name as qingjiaName ,a.qingjia_types as qingjiaTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.qingjia_kaishi_time as qingjiaKaishiTime ,a.qingjia_jieshu_time as qingjiaJieshuTime ,a.qingjia_content as qingjiaContent ,a.qingjia_yesno_types as qingjiaYesnoTypes ,a.qingjia_yesno_text as qingjiaYesnoText ,a.qingjia_shenhe_time as qingjiaShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yonghu.zhiwu_types as zhiwuTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM qingjia a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.qingjia_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaUuidNumber},'%')
and a.qingjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaName},'%')
and a.qingjia_types = #{params.qingjiaTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaKaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaKaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaJieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaJieshuTimeEnd})
and a.qingjia_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaContent},'%')
and a.qingjia_yesno_types = #{params.qingjiaYesnoTypes}
and a.qingjia_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yonghu.zhiwu_types = #{params.zhiwuTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
